column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Ɔsor yɛ m'ahengua
column4: na asaase yɛ m'ananadzegua: ɔdan a ɔtse dɛn na hom besi ama me

column2: "Na ndzɛmba iyinom nyinara me nsa na ɔayɛ
column3: na mbrɛ ndzɛmba iyinom nyinara yɛe bae nye no
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse: naaso nyimpa a mobɔhwɛ no nye oyi
column5: mekyerɛ onyia no a ɔyɛ ɔbɔbɔfo na sunsum a ɔabobɔ
column6: na no ho popo wɔ m'asɛm ntsi no."

column2: "Nyia oku ɔnantwi ɔtse dɛ nyia oku nyimpa ara so; nyia oku eguambaa bɔ afɔr no
column3: ɔtse dɛ nyia obu kraman no kɔn mu; nyia ɔbɔ edziban afɔr no
column4: ɔtse dɛ nyia ɔbɔ preko bɔgyaa afɔr; nyia ɔhyew eduhuam no
column5: ɔtse dɛ nyia ohyira ohonyi: nyew
column6: hɔn nyinara asan mu eyiyi hɔnankasa hɔn akwan
column7: na hɔn kra enyi gye hɔn ekyiwadze mu;"

column2: "emi so mebɛsan mu meyi hɔn ndaadaa
column3: na medze hɔn suro aba hɔn do; osiandɛ mefrɛe a
column5: wɔanntse: na mbom wɔyɛɛ dza ɔyɛ mbusu wɔ m'enyi do
column6: na wɔsaan mu yii dza minnyi mu enyigye."

column2: "Hom ntsie EWURADZE n'asɛm
column3: hom a hom ho popo wɔ n'asɛm ho: Hom nuanom a wɔtan hom
column4: wɔtow hom kyen wɔ me dzin ntsi no
column7: ma yenhu hom enyigye; na hɔn dze

column2: "Dede weɔɔ fi kurow no mu
column3: dede fi asɔrdan no mu
column4: EWURADZE a otua n'atamfo hɔn ndzeyɛɛ do kaw no ne ndze a."

column2: "Onnyae nnkyemee no
column3: ɔwoe; awooyaw nnyae nnkaa no no

column2: "Woana atse iyi bi da? Woana ehu iyinom bi pɛn? Aso wɔkyem wo asaase da kor? Aso wɔwo ɔman prɛko? Naaso Zion dze
column3: ɔkyemee ara

column2: "Aso emi
column3: medze bɛba awotoa ano
column4: na meremma wɔnnwo? EWURADZE na ɔse. Aso emi a mema wɔwo no
column5: mibesiw awotoa ano? Wo Nyankopɔn na ɔse."

column2: "Hom nye Jerusalɛm ndzi ehurusi
column3: na hom ho nsɛpɛw hom wɔ no ho
column4: hom a hom dɔ no nyinara: hom nye no ndzi ehurusi wɔ enyigye ntsi
column5: hom a hom dzi no ho nkɔmbɔ nyinara:"

column2: "ama hom eenum n'awerɛkyekye enumfo no amee; ama hom dze enyigye aanom efi n'enyimnyam mbordo no mu."
"Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Hwɛ
column4: mebɛtsen asomdwee ama no dɛ esutsen
column5: na amanaman enyimnyam no dɛ ɔworaba a oeyir
column6: na hom bɔnom bi; wobotur hom nkyɛmfa mu

column2: "Dɛ obi a ne na kyekye no werɛ no
column3: dɛmara na mebɛkyekye hom werɛ; na hom werɛ bɛkyekye wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na hom bohu
column3: na hom akoma edzi ehurusi
column4: no hom mbiew bowuna dɛ ahaban fɔr: na wobohu EWURADZE ne nsa wɔ no nkowaa afamu

column2: "Na
column3: hwɛ
column5: na ne ntseaseanam bɛyɛ dɛ ekyinehyia mframa; dɛ ommbobu n'ebufuw ama wɔ ebufuhyew mu
column6: na ne nkaenyim wɔ ogyaframee mu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze ogya na afona na ɔnye adasa nyinara bedzi: na EWURADZE n'atɔfoe bɔdɔɔ so."
"Hɔn a wɔtsew hɔnho na woguar hɔnho dɛ wɔbɔkɔ nture mu a
column3: wodzi ɔbaako a odzi finimfin no n'ekyir
column6: na okura no; wɔbɔbɔ mu aba ewiei

column2: "Na minyim hɔn ndwuma na hɔn adwen: mber reba a mobɔboaboa amanaman na kasa horow nyinara ano; na wɔbɛba
column3: na woebohu m'enyimnyam."

column2: "Na medze asɛnkyerɛdze besi hɔn mu
column3: na masoma hɔn mu hɔn a wobefi nsa no akɔ amanaman no hɔ
column5: Put na Lud a wɔkontom egyen no
column7: nsuano aman a wɔwɔ ekyirekyir a wɔnntsee me nka
column8: eso wonnhun m'enyimnyam no; na wɔbɛka m'enyimnyam akyerɛ wɔ amanaman mu."

column2: "Na wɔdze hom nuanom nyinara befi amanaman nyinara mu aba dɛ ayɛyɛdze ama EWURADZE
column3: wɔ mpɔnkɔ do
column7: na mbowa a hɔn ho yɛ har do
column8: aba me bepɔw krɔnkrɔn Jerusalɛm do
column10: dɛ mbrɛ Israelmba dze hɔn ayɛyɛdze wɔ kɔɔpow a no ho tsew mu ba EWURADZE fie."

column2: "Na hɔn mu binom so na mebɛfa ayɛ asɔfo Levifo
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ ɔsorsor afofor na asaase fofor a mebɛyɛ no
column3: bɛka wɔ m'enyim no
column5: dɛmara so na hom asefo na hom dzin bɛka."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ ofi bosoom fofor kor do kodu kor so do
column3: na ofi ahomgyeda kor do kodu kor so do no
column4: nyimpa nyinara bɛba abɔsɔr wɔ m'enyim

column2: "Na wobefir edzi akɔ akɔhwɛ nyimpa a wɔato mbra etsia me no hɔn efun: na hɔn abowaba nnkowu
column3: eso hɔn gya nnkodum; na wɔbɛyɛ ekyiwadze ama adasa nyinara."
